Delve into a world of timeless beauty and practicality as you explore our range of handcrafted clay tableware. Whether you're hosting a dinner party or enjoying a quiet meal at home, our pottery adds a touch of sophistication to any occasion. Elevate Your Dining Experience with TerraWare Welcome to TerraWare, where every piece of clay tableware tells a story of craftsmanship and tradition. Immerse yourself in our curated collection, handcrafted by skilled artisans to bring warmth and authenticity to your table. From rustic dinnerware to elegant serving platters, each item is designed to evoke a sense of connection to the earth and its natural beauty. Join us in celebrating the art of dining and discover the perfect clay pottery to adorn your home. What started as a humble passion project has blossomed into a thriving business committed to delivering quality craftsmanship to homes around the world. Our team is our backbone, with each member bringing unique skills and dedication to the table. From our talented artisans who shape clay into works of art to our customer service representatives who ensure every interaction is seamless, we work together harmoniously to uphold the TerraWare standard of excellence. pages.privacy: Privacy Policy | TerraWare - Indian Clay Pottery Online Store Contact Us Our team Reviews Delivery +91-231-6425183 terraware@gmail.com Privacy Policy Welcome to TerraWare's Privacy Policy. Your privacy is important to us. At TerraWare, we recognize that privacy of your personal information is important. Here is information on what types of personal information we receive and collect when you use and visit TerraWare's website, and how we safeguard your information. We never sell your personal information to third parties. Information We Collect When you visit TerraWare, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device. Additionally, as you browse TerraWare, we collect information about the individual web pages or products that you view, what websites or search terms referred you to TerraWare, and information about how you interact with TerraWare. We refer to this automatically-collected information as "Device Information". How We Use Your Information We use the Device Information that we collect to help us screen for potential risk and fraud (in particular, your IP address), and more generally to improve and optimize our website (for example, by generating analytics about how our customers browse and interact with TerraWare, and to assess the success of our marketing and advertising campaigns). Information Sharing and Disclosure We share your Personal Information with third parties to help us use your Personal Information, as described above. For example, we use Google Analytics to help us understand how our customers use TerraWare. You can read more about how Google uses your Personal Information on their website. You can also opt-out of Google Analytics. Finally, we may also share your Personal Information to comply with applicable laws and regulations, to respond to a subpoena, search warrant, or other lawful request for information we receive, or to otherwise protect our rights. Your Rights If you are a European resident, you have the right to access personal information we hold about you and to ask that your personal information be corrected, updated, or deleted. If you would like to exercise this right, please contact us through the contact information below. Contact Us For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us by e-mail at terraware@gmail.com. Home Reviews Privacy policy Terms of Use Unearth the beauty of handcrafted elegance
